<<<<<<< HEAD
A proclamation, discharging the levying or transporting of souldiers vvithout licence Scotland. Privy Council. Gibson, Alexander, Sir, d. 1693. Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed by Andrew Anderson, Printer to the King's most excellent Majesty, Edinburgh : 1674.
Caption title. Royal arms at head of text; initial letter. Intentional blank spaces in text. Dated at end: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the first of October, one thousand six hundred, and seventy four years. Signed: Al. Gibson Cl. Sti. Concilii. Imperfect: creased and stained with slight loss of text. Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
=======
